result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Raul Sanchez-Rivera

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Raul Rivera Sanchez in court.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Sworn as Interpreter:  Fred Svensson.
Matter set for plea and sentencing.  Atty. Gary Rosenthal is in a hearing in another court and could not appear. Case is adjourned to Br. 1
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Discharge Report - 08-31-2022, filed.  rmm

Defendant Raul Sanchez-Rivera in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.   Sworn as interpreter: Daniel Lopez.
Defendant appeared after the calling of his case. Court VACATES the bench warrant issued. Bench warrant was not authorized. Defense requests and adjourned plea/sentencing hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 01.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court.  Michael Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a plea/sentencing hearing. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. No action taken on bail.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 08-09-2022, filed.  rmm

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court, defendant Raul Sanchez-Rivera not in court, in custody.  Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant's appearance waived.
Case in court for status. Defense has discovery and offer and requests a plea and sentencing. Case adjourned to Br. 01.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court, defendant Raul Rivera Sanchez not in court, in custody.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Status conference held.  Atty. Rosenthal was just appointed and has not received discovery or an offer and requests a status date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Raul Rivera Sanchez not in court, defendant in custody.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
OFF THE RECORD.  Status conference held.  The SPD office still not been able to appoint counsel and requests another date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Home Depot - Wauwatosa and R.W.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Raul Sanchez-Rivera in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Raul Sanchez-Rivera in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Raul Sanchez-Rivera appeared by video means with Attorney.   Case retabbed to Branch 1 Lower number cases pending.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
